name: invrvnge
story:
Space Invaders conversion. Player has to stop invaders from stealing fuel (lined along bottom of screen) while avoiding missiles. Invaders attack individually in patterns, some even spinning on their way down. Includes docking.

This is a Space Invaders conversion that was fairly common in the UK around 1980. It runs on Midway's hardware (EPROM swap), but it has a separate daughter board on the top of the three board sandwich, to provide the unique Invader's Revenge music and sound effects.
